homepage.heroDescriptionMiddle: with authentication, payments, and credits built in.
homepage.ctaSubtext: 10 free credits • No credit card required • Start building in seconds
homepage.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about our platform
homepage.faq1Answer: Sign up for an account to receive 10 free credits. Use the dashboard to explore features, or integrate our API into your application. Full documentation is available to help you get started quickly.
homepage.faq2Question: What can I build with this platform?
homepage.faq2Answer: This is a generic SaaS boilerplate that you can customize for any API-based service. It includes authentication, payment processing, credit management, and admin tools out of the box.
homepage.faq3Answer: Each API call consumes credits based on the operation. Sign up for 10 free credits to try the service. Purchase credit packs or subscribe for monthly credits as you scale.
homepage.faq4Question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
homepage.faq4Answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time through your billing dashboard. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period, and any remaining credits will stay in your account.
homepage.pricingCtaDescription: Stop building from scratch. Our boilerplate gets you to production in days, not months.
homepage.pricingCtaSubtext: 10 free credits • No credit card • Unused credits roll over
homepage.finalCtaDescription: Get started with our boilerplate today. No credit card needed.
homepage.finalCtaSubtext: 10 free credits • No credit card • See results before you pay
homepage.toastLoginRequired: Please sign in to access the dashboard

footer.description: A production-ready SaaS boilerplate with authentication, payments, and credits.
